nodes.content:
COM200

Buy premium.

Run your impressions on the most premium sites on the Internet. This ETD will ensure your impressions only run on the biggest and most prominent publishers, regardless of geography. TripleLift offers supply for 75% of the Comscore 100 and 79% of the Comscore 200. This ETD is comprised of inventory exclusively from those sites across Native, Display and Video placements. If you need to run your campaign on the most trafficked properties, COM200 is the ETD for you.

All TripleLift ETDs are refreshed on an on-going basis so that only the highest performing placements are included. COM200 enables buyers to take control of exposure through the most visible impressions in programmatic media.

Holdings

Buy them preassembled.

Customize them your way.

Build your own from scratch.

Activate this ETD now.
nodes.title: COM200

nodes.content:
SPORTS

Score fans.

Find sports fans wherever they may be. This ETD captures inventory on traditional sports sites, sports gaming sites and alternative sports to ensure you are reaching audiences practicing their fandom. Sports may be different in the era of Covid, but they are no less an outlet for passion for billions of people around the world. SPORTS is comprised of your choice of Native, Display and Video inventory, in placements known to deliver high viewability and high video completion rates.

All TripleLift ETDs are refreshed on an on-going basis so that only the highest performing placements are included. SPORTS enables buyers to take control of exposure through the most visible impressions in programmatic media.

Holdings

Buy them preassembled.

Customize them your way.

Build your own from scratch.

Activate this ETD now.
nodes.title: SPORTS

nodes.content:
HOME

Reach Nesters.

Reach Nesters — people who are investing their time and money close to home. This ETD is targeted towards audiences spending time on home improvement, home entertaining, outfitting their setups, browsing real estate, raising kids and adopting pets. It is comprised of your choice of Native, Display and Video inventory, in placements known to deliver high viewability and high video completion rates.

All TripleLift ETDs are refreshed on an on-going basis so that only the highest performing placements are included. HOME enables buyers to take control of exposure through the most visible impressions in programmatic media.

Holdings

Buy them preassembled.

Customize them your way.

Build your own from scratch.

Activate this ETD now.
nodes.title: HOME

nodes.content:
HiCLICK

Drive Traffic.

Drive traffic through placements known to deliver audiences to clickthrough. HiCLICK delivers 0.3%+ clickthrough rate, allowing buyers to deliver prospects and customers to their sites. This ETD is composed of impressions exclusively in Native formats, known to deliver traffic effectively. If you need traffic, HiCLICK performs.

All TripleLift ETDs are refreshed on an on-going basis so that only the highest performance placements are included. All of our Performance ETDs offer platform-wide optimization at the placement level.

Holdings

Buy them preassembled.

Customize them your way.

Build your own from scratch.

Activate this ETD now.
nodes.title: HiCLICK

nodes.content:
HiVIEW

Be Seen.

Be seen in placements with the highest rates of viewability. HiVIEW delivers 70%+ viewability, enabling buyers to take control of exposure through the most visible impressions in programmatic media. This ETD is composed of impressions that are in-feed, above the fold and in page placements known to deliver high rates of viewability. If you need your campaigns to be seen, HiVIEW delivers.

All TripleLift ETDs are refreshed on an on-going basis so that only the highest performance placements are included. All of our Performance ETDs offer platform-wide optimization at the placement level.

Holdings

Buy them preassembled.

Customize them your way.

Build your own from scratch.

Activate this ETD now.
nodes.title: HiVIEW

nodes.content:
ALTSOC

Extend social.

Extend your social buys with native advertising made for the open web. Whether you are a regular advertiser on social platforms or have decided to scale back your spend, this ETD delivers inventory similar in context and performance. ALTSOC pairs Native impressions along with the parameters offered in our HiVIEW and HiVCR ETDs to deliver performance-oriented inventory similar to the social platforms. Easily activate this ETD by repurposing your social creative. If you are seeking a social-like ad experience, with added brand safety, ALTSOC is an effective solution.

All TripleLift ETDs are refreshed on an on-going basis so that only the highest performance placements are included.

Holdings

Buy them preassembled.

Customize them your way.

Build your own from scratch.

Activate this ETD now.
nodes.title: ALTSOC

nodes.content:
UNREP

Advance Equality.

Advance equality by buying impressions on sites owned by underrepresented communities.  UNREP buys impressions on sites majority owned by women, minorities and LGBTQ. Do your share to support equality, while reaching audiences that have been historically underserved by advertising. Leverage the full package of amazing publishers -or- choose the segment thats most important to your brand. With the direct nature of TripleLifts publisher relationships, more of your dollars will go straight to media companies. This ETD is constructed with Display, Native and Video placements depending on your creative requirements. If you have an objective to support underrepresented media owners, UNREP is the place for your dollars.

TripleLift ETDs are frequently refreshed to deliver the most relevant placements. New inventory is routinely added to ensure media spend supports voices in need.

Holdings

Buy them preassembled.

Customize them your way.

Build your own from scratch.

Activate this ETD now.
nodes.title: UNREP

nodes.content:
HELPJ

Support news.

Support news through media dollars spent on sites known to gather and produce the highest quality journalism. Reach informed audiences while helping support a category hit hard by exclusion lists and the shift to social platforms. This ETD is constructed with Display, Native and Video placements depending on your creative requirements. If your brand seeks to help this category, HELPJ is the way to do so locally or globally.

TripleLift ETDs are frequently refreshed to deliver the most relevant placements. New inventory is routinely cycled-in to ensure media spend supports appropriate publishers.

SHOP

Find Shoppers.

Find shoppers as they browse and make purchase decisions.  SHOP pairs impressions on shopping sites along with the parameters offered in our HiVIEW and HiVCR ETDs to deliver the most performance-oriented shopping inventory available. This ETD is constructed with Display, Native and Video placements depending on your creative requirements. If you want to reach shoppers during any season of the year SHOP will get the job done.

TripleLift ETDs are frequently refreshed to deliver the most relevant placements. Fresh inventory is routinely cycled-in to fit the needs of shoppers year-round.

nodes.title: SHOP

nodes.content:
LDA

Reach Adults.

Reach adults through our Legal Drinking Age compliant ETD.  LDA has an audience 75% Adults 21+.  Customization is available for more or less restrictive guidelines dictated by objective, geography, or further age requirements. This ETD is constructed with Display, Native and Video placements depending on your creative requirements. If you need to reach adults of legal drinking age, LDA is an effective base with which to start your media plan.

TripleLift ETDs are frequently refreshed to deliver the most relevant placements. Fresh inventory is routinely cycled-in to fit the needs of beer and spirits advertisers.

nodes.title: LDA

nodes.content:
HiVCR

Get watched.

Get watched using impressions confirmed to drive high rates of video completion. HiVCR delivers 70%+ video completion rate, enabling buyers to be confident that video ads and content will be viewed. This ETD consists of units that are known to drive video viewership at high-rates of completion. If you need full video completions, HiVCR is an effective solution.

All TripleLift ETDs are refreshed on an on-going basis so that only the highest performance placements are included. All of our Performance ETDs offer platform-wide optimization at the placement level.
